subtitle: A quick cake to make - filled and decorated with fresh strawberries.

method.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Grease 2 x 18 cm / 7 inch cake tins.
Melt butter and sugar in a pan. Tip into a bowl to cool for 2 min. Add egg and beat well. Fold in flour. Mix bicarbonate of soda with milk and add to mixture.
Pour into tins. Bake for 25 min. Turn out of tins. Cool on wire rack.
Chop half the strawberries. Whip cream and fold half into the strawberries. Use to sandwich cakes together.
Spread a little of the remaining cream on top of the cake. Pipe remainder around the edge. Decorate with the remaining fruit.

title: Summer fruit gateau
